%vlocity_namespace%__Description__c:
1) In this template: Component section displays ALL those in lineItems INCLUDING Addons that have been added to cart.
2) In this template: There is a SEPARATE Addon Section, which displays ALL Addons in childProducts (irrespective if they have been added to cart already), such that they can be used by user to add the Addon again to the cart
Name: cpq-product-addon-item
